fields.name: title
value: Where can I pickup my order?

fields.name: content
value: You can pickup your order from the department listed in your order confirmation. After you place your order, you will receive an order confirmation as well as a confirmation e-mail listing the pickup information as well as pickup hours if applicable.

displayName: Where can I pickup my order?

fields.name: title
value: What number do I call if I would like to place my order by telephone, or have questions

fields.name: content
value: Give us a call at 1-800-767-7772 to place your order, locate your store on the catering page and order online or visit your local shop and stop by our Deli, Bakery, Meat, Seafood, Produce, or Floral departments where our associates will be happy to assist you with all the details of your order.

displayName: What number do I call if I would like to place my order by telephone, or have questions

fields.name: title
value: How do I pay for my order?

fields.name: content
value: All payments must be made at time of pickup. After you have received your order, you can pay at the checkout registers using the form of payment you normally use when paying for your groceries. The cashier will add applicable sales tax to your order total at this point. At this time, you cannot pay for your order online.

displayName: How do I pay for my order?

fields.name: title
value: What is the minimum age at which someone can register an Rx account?

name: what-is-the-minimum-age-at-which-someone-can-register-an-rx-account
displayName: What is the minimum age at which someone can register an Rx account?

fields.name: content
value: Not yet, but we’re working on it! We know how convenient this would be.

fields.name: title
value: Do I need an Rx number to create an account?

fields.name: content
value: Yes. We need a patient’s last name, date of birth, store number, and Rx number for every order.

name: do-i-need-an-rx-number-to-create-an-account
displayName: Do I need an Rx number to create an account?

fields.name: content
value:
Stop & Shop offers "Unattended Delivery" for those who cannot be home to receive their order.* Simply let us know you will not be home when you are selecting your delivery time. We cannot guarantee the quality of items that are not unpacked within an hour after the delivery window."

Delivery Instructions

During checkout, include instructions for your Stop & Shop Delivery Driver as to where to leave your delivery. Choose an area outside your home that is accessible yet secure and protected, keeping weather conditions in mind. We cannot be responsible for any unforeseen damage or theft that occurs to your order. If, for any reason, your Stop & Shop Delivery Driver feels the designated area is unsafe, we reserve the right to not leave your order.

Coupons & Tips

Coupons and tips should be left in a conspicuous spot in the designated delivery area for your Stop & Shop Delivery Driver to collect. Coupons will be credited to your account. If you have a PodBag™, coupons and tips can be left in the small pocket located on the front right corner of your bag.

Alcoholic Beverages

Alcoholic beverages cannot be delivered with our unattended service.

Warnings

Your order may be packed with dry ice to ensure product quality. Do not touch dry ice with your bare hands. Simply allow the unused portion of dry ice to sublimate in a well-ventilated area.

 

*not available in all locations.

fields.name: content
value:
Please make sure that someone is home and available to accept your order during your scheduled delivery time. If we are unable to leave your order, or must make multiple delivery attempts, you will be charged a fee. See Service Fees & Tipping.

Please secure your pets prior to your driver's arrival.

To ensure the freshness of your products, your order may be packed with dry ice.
Do not touch dry ice with your bare hands. Simply allow the dry ice to evaporate.

fields.name: content
value:
Where can I pick up my order?

You can pick up your order from the department listed in your order confirmation. After you place your order, you will receive an order confirmation as well as a confirmation e-mail listing the pickup information as well as pickup hours if applicable.

How will I receive my receipt for my online order?

Every new Stop and Shop Delivery & Pickup customer is automatically signed up to receive electronic receipts. If you also would like to receive a paper copy of your receipt with your order, you can indicate this preference in my account.

How do you ensure the product quality for online orders?

We stock only the highest-quality meat and produce available, which we hand-pick and pack just for you. Our Produce Specialists are trained to use their senses - sight, touch and smell - to choose only the freshest produce. Before an order leaves for Delivery or Pickup, it's often checked by our Quality Control Specialist for accuracy and proper packaging.

You'll be amazed and delighted at the selection and quality of the thousands of products we offer. You'll find restaurant-quality meats, the freshest seafood and produce picked daily. We carry all your favorite national brands, plus a full line of private label products to help save you money. Our selection also includes household necessities, pet supplies, and health and beauty care items.

Your complete satisfaction is our number one goal. If for any reason you are dissatisfied with a product in your order, please call our If you are missing a product which is not noted as out of stock, you have 48 hours from the time of delivery to notify Stop & Shop Customer Care for a full refund. This is not applicable to alcoholic beverage products - the driver must be notified at the time of delivery.

What if a product I choose for my online order is Out of Stock?

Occasionally, a product you order online may be out of stock and, in most cases, we will automatically substitute with a similar item. If you elect to receive substitutions for products ordered online for delivery or pickup and your original product choice had a GO Points™ offer, we reserve the right to substitute a product that does not have a GO Points offer available. In this case, you will not receive GO Points for your substituted product purchase.

While we make every attempt to substitute like for like items, ingredients can often vary. Please check the substituted item carefully for any allergy concerns. If the item does not meet your expectations, please call Customer Care team at 1-800-767-7772 and we will gladly refund the purchase price.

How long is the pricing of an item online valid?

Prices for items you place in your online cart will be guaranteed as long as your order is submitted prior to the sale price expiration date and delivered (or picked up by you at a designated pickup location) within 7 calendar days from the day you originally placed your order. After 7 days, prices will be adjusted to reflect current prices. The dates for current advertised sale prices can be found on the Specials page.

*Unit prices are subject to rounding error and are displayed to assist in comparison shopping. Please refer to the price field to determine the total cost of the product. Prices and totals listed online, and on email confirmations, are estimated and do not include any applicable bottle deposits or bottle taxes and are subject to change due to actual weights, taxes and availability.

How do I find the Country of Origin for products online?

Certain products must comply with country of origin labeling (COOL) requirements. Those products include beef, lamb, pork, fish, perishable agricultural commodities such as fruits and vegetables, and peanuts, ginseng, pecans and macadamia nuts and coffee. To determine the country of origin of these products, view the item detail. If there are multiple countries of origin possible for a certain product, then each country will be listed in the item detail. Upon receipt of the item, most packaging will reflect the specific country.

fields.name: title
value: What if I am not home to accept a delivery?

fields.name: content
value:
You may select our Unattended Delivery Service (where available). The delivery driver will deliver your order in temperature-controlled bins to a secure area outside your home. For unattended deliveries, you may not order alcohol or tobacco products.

To ensure the freshness of your products, your order may be packed with dry ice.

Do not touch dry ice with your bare hands. Simply allow the dry ice to evaporate.

Please note if you have selected contactless delivery, our driver must have confirmation you are home and available to accept your order via a phone call or text. If our driver does not get a response, your order will not be delivered.

displayName: What if I am not home to accept a delivery?

fields.name: title
value: How do I get a Stop & Shop Card?

fields.name: content
value:
You can sign up for a Stop & Shop Card online by creating a Stop & Shop Account. When you apply for a Stop & Shop Card online for the first time and create your Stop & Shop Account, you will be able to print a temporary Stop & Shop Card Card that you can use immediately. Continue to use your temporary card until you receive your new Stop & Shop Card in the mail.

You may also sign up for a Stop & Shop Card at the Customer Service Desk. You will receive a card on the spot and may begin using it right away. However, we recommend that you sign up online in order to take advantage of the online offers.

name: how-do-i-get-a-stop--shop-card
displayName: How do I get a Stop & Shop Card?

fields.name: content
value: Yes, as long as the items are still in your cart when you log into your account, you can cancel your order and choose whether to keep the items in your cart. Press the Cart button and then choose to cancel your order. The prices for items you leave in your cart will be adjusted to reflect current prices and sales. You can also change your delivery day and time.

name: can-i-cancel-my-stop--shop-online-order
displayName: Can I cancel my Stop & Shop online order?

fields.name: title
value: How can I purchase Stop & Shop gift cards?

fields.name: content
value: You can buy Stop & Shop gift cards for any amount from $5.00 up to $500.00 per card. Cards are available at all registers and at our Gift Card Kiosk. Gift Cards are also available online. For more information, please call 1-800-767-7772 M-F 8a - 7p, Saturdays 8a - 5p, Sundays - closed.

name: how-can-i-purchase-stop--shop-gift-cards
displayName: How can I purchase Stop & Shop gift cards?

fields.name: title
value: Does Stop & Shop offer a fundraising program?

fields.name: content
value: Stop & Shop does currently offer support to non-profit organizations to raise funds. All non-profit organizations will receive a 5% year-round discount on orders of $500.00 or more upon account set up and approval.  For more information or to order gift cards, please call 1-800-767-7772M-F 8a - 7p, Saturdays 8a - 5p, Sundays - closed.

name: does-stop--shop-offer-a-fundraising-program
displayName: Does Stop & Shop offer a fundraising program?

fields.name: title
value: Does Stop & Shop offer gift cards from other retailers?

fields.name: content
value: Yes/ Stop & Shop offers a variety of gift cards from many fine retailers, as well as Mastercard, AMEX, and Visa. Click here for more information.

name: does-stop--shop-offer-gift-cards-from-other-retailers
displayName: Does Stop & Shop offer gift cards from other retailers?

fields.name: content
value: Certain products must comply with country of origin labeling (COOL) requirements. Those products are beef, lamb, pork, fish, perishable agricultural commodities such as fruits and vegetables, and peanuts, ginseng, pecans and macadamia nuts. To determine the country of origin of these products, view the item detail. If there are multiple countries of origin possible for a certain product, then every possible country will be listed in the item detail. Upon receipt of the item, most packaging will reflect the specific country.
